II. Purpose of Addendum
The purpose of this addendum is to modify the terms of the child caring institution
license, to include placement of females to the short-term detention program.
III. Methodology
03/06/09 Contact – Letter received. Request to change terms of license to accept
11 females into the short-term detention program and reduce the male
short-term detention to 44 and male treatment program to 33.
03/12/09 Contact – Face to face. Interviewed Executive Director and Center
Director. Toured facility and self-contained unit to be utilized by
females.
03/13/09 Reviewed program statement and description, and policies and
procedures.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
On 03/12/09 the Executive Director and Center Director were interviewed on-site
along with a tour of the self-contained unit to be utilized by the female residents.
The program statement and description, and policies and procedures were
presented and reviewed on 03/13/09. The Executive Director stated the rationale for
expanding their program to accept females was at the request of Wayne County for
them to provide a safe, secure, highly structured, stable, culturally and gender
sensitive environment for female youth awaiting court hearings and transitioning
between placements. The facility will begin accepting female referrals for placement
once they inform Wayne County of their licensing terms being updated to include
females. The program statement and description, policies and procedures, and
updated documentation formats were found to be in compliance with all applicable
licensing rules and statutes. The female short-term detention program will provide a
direct care staffing ratio of at least two direct care staff to 10 residents during the day
and afternoon shifts and one staff to 10 residents during the night shift. Female staff
will initially be assigned to the female detention program. Program policies and
procedures appropriately address female resident medical needs and further
addresses personal care, hygiene and clothing needs.
3

V. Recommendation
Recommendation is made to continue the regular license with modification of the
terms to add females.
